title: Linear Dilaton Background and Fully Localized Intersecting Five-branes
abstract: We investigate a near-horizon geometry of NS5-branes wrapping on a Riemann surface, which asymptotically approaches to linear dilaton backgrounds. We concretely find a fully localized solution of the near-horizon geometry of intersecting NS5-branes. We also discuss a relation to a description of Landau-Ginzburg theories.
